mapper.select: select id, pwd, email, email_chk, address, birth, sex, phone, joinDate, admin, nickName, name, point from Member
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(id, pwd, email, email_chk, address, birth, sex, phone, joinDate, admin, nickName, name, point) VALUES(#{id},#{pwd},#{email}, #{email_chk}, #{address}, #{birth}, #{sex}, #{phone}, sysdate, #{admin}, #{nickName}, #{name}, #{point})
mapper.select: select id, pwd, email, email_chk, address, birth, sex, phone, joinDate, admin, nickName, name, point from member where id = #{id}
